Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: biofeedback \bi`o*feed"back\ n. a training program in which a person is given information about physiological processes (heart rate or blood pressure) that is not normally available with the goal of gaining conscious control of them. [WordNet 1.5]

biofeedback n : a training program in which a person is given information about physiological processes (heart rate or blood pressure) that is not normally available with the goal of gaining conscious control of them
